data.name: Energy.Fire.Name
data.value: Fire

data.name: Energy.Fire.Description
data.value: A manifestation of heat and energy, consuming flammable materials rapidly and spreading destruction with intense speed.

data.name: Gas.Corruption.Description
data.value: A gaseous version of corruption, it spreads through the air and contaminates everything within its reach, making the environment inhospitable.

data.name: Gas.Smoke.Description
data.value: A byproduct of combustion, it rises slowly, obscuring the air and indicating the presence of fire or burning.

data.name: Gas.Steam.Description
data.value: Hot water vapor that rises rapidly and disperses into the air.

data.name: Liquid.Acid.Description
data.value: A highly corrosive liquid that dissolves various materials on contact with extreme speed.

data.name: Liquid.Corruption.Description
data.value: Highly contaminating liquid substance, flowing freely and corrupting all matter with which it interacts.

data.name: Liquid.Lava.Description
data.value: Molten rock that incinerates almost everything on contact. It cools down into solid stone if exposed to lower temperatures.

data.name: Liquid.Water.Description
data.value: Essential and fluid liquid, with dynamic behavior. It can be frozen or evaporated. It can put out fires along the way.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.Corruption.Description
data.value: Crystallized and dense form of corruption. Immobile and permanent, it creates irreversible contaminated zones.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.Glass.Description
data.value: A transparent yet fragile material, shattering on impact or disintegrating under high temperatures.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.Iron.Description
data.value: A strong, iron-based element. It withstands fire but melts into lava under extreme heat.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.MountingBlock.Description
data.value: Functional and decorative block, available in vibrant colors. Flammable, it adds dynamism and aesthetics to mobile constructions.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.RedBrick.Description
data.value: Strong and durable block, ideal for fortified constructions, especially due to its fire resistance.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.TreeLeaf.Description
data.value: Natural and flammable foliage, common in forest areas. It can be used to decorate and enrich the natural scenery.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.Wall.Description
data.value: An impenetrable, solid barrier. Resistant to natural forces and unaffected by other elements.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.Wood.Description
data.value: A natural, flammable material often used in constructions. Burns easily when in contact with fire.

data.name: Solid.Movable.Corruption.Description
data.value: An unstable substance that spreads and infects corruptible materials, causing unstoppable destruction across the world.

data.name: Solid.Movable.Dirt.Description
data.value: Dry soil, the foundation for vegetation. Turns into mud when exposed to water.

data.name: Solid.Movable.Grass.Description
data.value: A dense and durable rock. Melts into lava under extreme heat and crumbles into sand after prolonged water exposure.

data.name: Solid.Movable.Ice.Description
data.value: Frozen water in solid form. Slippery and melts back into water when exposed to heat.

data.name: Solid.Movable.Mud.Description
data.value: A dense mixture of dirt and water. When heated, it dries up and turns back into dirt.

data.name: Solid.Movable.Sand.Description
data.value: Fine, loose grains that flow and accumulate easily. Under extreme heat, it fuses into glass.

data.name: Solid.Movable.Snow.Description
data.value: Accumulated ice crystals in light flakes. Melts into water when exposed to heat.

data.name: Solid.Movable.Stone.Description
data.value: A dense and durable rock. Melts into lava under extreme heat and crumbles into sand after prolonged water exposure.

data.name: Solid.Immovable.Lamp.Name
data.value: Lamp

data.name: Solid.Immovable.Lamp.Description
data.value: A light source capable of illuminating surroundings and highlighting details. Durable and fixed, it is perfect for environments that require constant clarity.
